title: Graphic & Web Design Intern
longSummary: Contributed to the design and development of client-facing WordPress pages, building responsive blog, tutorial, and press templates while enhancing homepage styling. Created reusable PHP shortcodes, improved front-end accessibility and UX, and collaborated with design, marketing, and editorial teams. Gained hands-on experience in SEO, local search (MEO), and brand-focused content production for small and mid-sized businesses.
responsibilities: Developed and styled WordPress pages using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Created responsive templates for blog, tutorial, and press sections
Implemented reusable PHP shortcodes and template parts for editors
Modified and optimized front-end CSS for accessibility and UX
Optimized images and assets to improve site load performance
Assisted with graphic design, branding assets, and page layouts
Collaborated with marketing and editorial teams on content strategy
Wrote internal documentation and tutorials for client editors
Supported basic SEO and MEO improvements across key pages
Pages worked on include the homepage, blog, tutorials, and press releases

title: Web Design Chair
organization: Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity, Inc.
longSummary: Led the redesign of the chapter website to improve recruitment flow, highlight events, and present a more modern visual identity. Coordinated with chapter members to gather photos, copy, and updates, and maintained the site throughout the academic year.
responsibilities: Led the redesign of the chapter website with a focus on recruitment and events
Planned page structure and navigation for potential new members and alumni
Coordinated content and assets (photos, copy, graphics) with chapter members
Deployed responsive templates and updated styles using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Maintained and updated the site each semester with new events and information

title: Web Designer
longSummary: Designed and implemented a responsive website concept to showcase products, events, and brand story for a food-focused small business. Improved online discoverability and simplified order/booking flows with clear sections, hierarchy, and strong call-to-actions.
responsibilities: Designed page layouts and responsive components for the homepage and menu
Built accessible HTML/CSS pages and interactive UI with vanilla JavaScript
Optimized images and assets for performance on mobile and low-bandwidth connections
Worked with the owners to iterate on content, visual style, and calls-to-action

title: Graphic Designer
longSummary: Produced branding and promotional artwork for product launches and events, including packaging mockups, social graphics, and print collateral. Collaborated with the marketing lead to refine the visual identity and ensure consistent brand language across channels.
responsibilities: Created brand assets, logo variations, and packaging mockups for new products
Designed promotional materials for markets, pop-ups, and social media campaigns
Prepared print-ready files and coordinated with vendors for physical collateral
